name: Magic Invasion
description:
v1.0.0

After two years of study of game development, 3D modelling and animations, I'm happy to announce my first game.

Live the experience of a wizard who has to save his world from an aliens' invasion. The game starts in the wizard's castle and goes through dungeons. At the end, you'll find out the leader of the invasion.

I know that the road to create A-class games is still long, but I'm proud of this little start.

Instructions

WASD - move

SHIFT - open shield sphere

MOUSE LEFT - shoot

E - action

MOUSE RIGHT - aim

Please comment below if you find any bugs.
